explains: adj. 情报的；报告的；新闻的

sentences.en: These methods can be classified into three types of informational writing: factual, descriptive and process.
sentences.cn: 这些方法可分为三类信息写作：事实性、描述性和过程性。

sentences.en: Another beneficial aspect of group exercise is the informational support participants receive from the instructor.
sentences.cn: 团体健身的另一好处是，参与者可以从教练那里获得有用的信息。
嵌入式信息和错误消息。
